ValidationRule.description: if Assigned To is empty and Request Status <> Open, Cancelled, Assigned
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISBLANK(Assigned_To__c ) , NOT ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE(Assigned_To__c) ), PRIORVALUE( Request_Status__c) = 'Open' , TEXT(Request_Status__c) <> 'Open' , TEXT(Request_Status__c) <> 'Cancelled' )
